name: Chicken Not Pie
description:
A humorous one-page game about animals trying to escape the farm before becoming dinner. Powered by the Apocalypse and inspired by Honey Heist.

You are a bird, and you’re stuck in a farm. You don’t want that anymore, do you? So do something about it! It’s time to escape. All you need is a six-sided die or two and a few friends!

Choose between 6 birds and 6 skills to create your character. Feel free to add additional farm animals or come up with a different skill to suit the character you want. Have fun and don't get baked into pie!
